title: GORENJE GS642E90W
description:
Machine for washing
Energy class:A++
Capacity:13 sets
Program for washing delicates
Function Speedwash
Number of programs:2
System for gentle drum:MultiCare
Program for washing wool:11L
Detergent consumption per program:3080 l
Maximum temperature of the water in the washing drum: 60 °C
Control:Control with display (TouchControl)
Indicator for the end of the wash on the floor:LightSignal
Delay start option:Delay start 0-24 hours
Function for tablets 3 in 1
Possibility for connecting the washing machine to the water supply:Hot and cold
Temperature of the water (°C): 40/55/60/65/70
Protection from flooding:Complete protection AquaStop
Additional features:Additional protection of the heater
Noise: 47 dB(A)
Dimensions:84.5 x 59.9 x 59.7cm
